summary: This is a config for the Categorized Favorites Mod which optimizes for pure magic based gameplay.
descriptionHtml:
I love the Categorized Favorites mod, but I\'m playing a very pure mage right now, so I didn\'t need categories like \'Armor\' and \'Weapons\'. This mod changes most of the categories so they are more useful to a magic based character. 

Spells aren\'t divided along school lines; the categories used are as below:

Destruction
Defense
Control
Summoning
Utility
Shouts/Powers
Apparel
Other

I found this to be the most convenient way to split up spells for easy access. 

To install just throw the Data folder in your Skyrim folder.

Of course, you need the original [url=http://skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=4862]Categorized Favorites[/url] mod to make this work. Thanks to the author of that awesome mod!

Edit: I just uploaded another version which works along school lines, if you\'d prefer that categorization. Enjoy!
author: GeneralERA
